# dataproductportal_environment (Data Source)

Fetches an environment from the Data Product Portal.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dataproductportal_environment" "example" {
  id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier.

### Read-Only

- `acronym` (String) The acronym.
- `context` (String) The context.
- `is_default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default environment.
- `name` (String) The name.
